meanings.definition: Producing or growing at the apex; growing from the tip.
meanings.sent1: The acrogenic plant grew tall from its tip.
meanings.sent2: The tree's acrogenic branches reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent3: The acrogenic flower seemed to wave at the sun from its highest point.
meanings.sent4: Her acrogenic ambition soared above all others.
meanings.sent5: The acrogenic mountain stood proudly at the peak of the range.

meanings.definition: Originating at the apex; developing from the tip.
meanings.sent1: The acrogenic leaves sprouted elegantly from the plant's tip.
meanings.sent2: The acrogenic vines climbed steadily towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The acrogenic hair on the doll made it look like a tiny forest.
meanings.sent4: His acrogenic ideas blossomed into successful projects.
meanings.sent5: The acrogenic tower dominated the skyline with its height.
